title: 9 Best Fourth of July Furniture Sales 2025: Early Deals to Shop Ahead of Independence Day
description: A curated list to help you cut down on screen time
author: Audrey Lee, Leah Muncy
excerpt: We found the best Fourth of July furniture sales ahead of the holiday. Including deals from Crate & Barrel, Serena & Lily, Castlery
text: All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. html:
All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, we may receive compensation from retailers and/or from purchases of products through these links.

The best Fourth of July furniture sales are here ahead of schedule this year, which is the kind of immediate gratification anyone who’s been counting down to the long weekend can get behind. Fourth of July sale promotions are an excellent time to score deep discounts on investment pieces like a stylish new sectional, some new outdoor furniture, or something nice for your drab home office. Not sure where to start? We got a head start on the scrolling and clicking to find you some of the best Fourth of July furniture sales that are actually worth the screen time, from some of our favorite retailers like Castlery, Article, and beyond. Keep an eye on this page, as we’ll continue feeding you more of the best furniture deals to browse in between lighting sparklers and grilling hotdogs.

Our Top Picks for the Best Fourth of July Sale Furniture Deals:

  • Best Rug: AllModern Racheal Light Green Rug, $165 $139
  • Best Sofa Set: Castlery Jonathan Leather Extended Sofa with Ottoman, $4,646 $3,646
  • Best Outdoor Chair: Serena & Lily Pacifica Outdoor Pendant, $698 $523
  • Best Mattress: Casper Dream Max Hybrid, $3,195 $2,235

Crate & Barrel

Crate & Barrel’s outdoor furniture sale is so good we had to shout it out twice—right now you can score up to 60% off on clearance items to outfit your space (note that some are Final Sale), and up to 40% off regular-priced outdoor items. The deals include nature-inspired seating like outdoor teak sectionals that stand out from the crowd. Plus, picks with functionality like a kitchen island that can double as an outdoor bar and sage-hued aluminum dining chairs. What’s more, you can double your rewards with outdoor furniture purchases.

Crate & Barrell Batten Teak L-Shaped Outdoor Sectional Sofa

Crate & Barrel Bari Stackable Outdoor Dining Chair with Cushion

Saatva

If you’re already purchasing some new sheets, then you might as well snag a new mattress to put your sheets on. Luckily Saatva, one of our favorite mattresses, is hosting a limited-time sale ahead of Fourth of July. We’d recommend taking advantage of the pre-holiday deals to get the brand’s Loom & Leaf memory foam mattress, which contributor Bailey Berg called the “most breathable, comfortable mattress” she’s ever tried.

Saatva Loom & Leaf Mattress

Saatva Santorini Bed Frame

Serena & Lily

There is no better way to get summer started than by decorating your home to look like a dreamy Cape Cod cottage. Serena & Lily can help you a bit in that department with their ongoing sales promotions, offering up to 25% off alfresco dining festivities and can’t-miss deals in their regular clearance section.

Serena & Lily Pacifica Outdoor Pendant

Serena & Lily Pacifica Left-Facing Chaise Sectional

Wayfair

Wayfair is great for those “I need a piece of furniture, quick!” moments. It’s also great for holiday sales. Right now, the major retailer’s offering up to 50% off during their pre-Fourth of July sale on bedroom furniture (including this area rug and sleeper sofa that the AD team has personally tested). Be sure to take advantage of these major markdowns on investment pieces like a bed frame, dresser, area rug, and more.

AllModern Racheal Light Green Rug

Wade Logan Kodie Upholstered Sleeper Sofa

Pottery Barn

There’s lots of deals going on at Pottery Barn, one of our go-tos for investment-worthy pieces for any area of the home. Ahead of Fourth of July the brand is offering up to 50% off select items. There’s also lots of hidden gems on clearance and included in the brand's “outlet deals,” meaning it’s worth sifting through the clearance section for hidden gems—like this outdoor sconce that has a rustic feel.

Pottery Barn Abbott Acacia Woven Outdoor Lounge Chair (Set of 2)

Pottery Barn Pearce Glass Outdoor Sconce

Castlery

If you’re looking to deck out your dining room, home office, living room, or any other space in your house with new pieces, head straight to Castlery’s early access Fourth of July sale. Commerce director Rachel Fletcher especially loved reclining on the Jonathan chaise sectional sofa, and you can get a Jonathan leather sofa that comes with an ottoman at a little under $700 off.

Castlery Jonathan Leather Extended Sofa with Ottoman

Castlery Duncan Coffee Table

Lulu and Georgia

One of our favorite furniture retailers (and a hotspot for designer collaborations) announced up to 40% select styles to celebrate Fourth of July early with deeper discounts to be found in its official clearance section. You can snag delicious deals across all categories, including bedroom pieces, outdoor furniture, and decor for any area of your home. We think it’s a particularly excellent opportunity to add this modern Sarah Sherman Samuel-designed mirror to your entryway or build a whole new living room around the Banks sofa.

Ripple Round Mirror by Sarah Sherman Samuel

Lulu and Georgia Banks Sofa

Interior Define

Our contributor Rachel Kalichman called Interior Define’s Gaby sectional “an elegant and neutral piece that can fit any type of decor style.” Head to their site now for up to 25% off sitewide.

Interior Define Gaby Leather Chaise Sectional

Interior Define Leah Floor Lamp

Cozy Earth

Bedding and loungewear: They are the finishing touch for any carefully curated room. Now’s your chance to try the bedding brand that both Oprah and commerce editor Audrey Lee gave their stamps of approval. Save up to 30% during the brand’s ongoing sale. We recommend stocking up on the cool-to-the-touch bamboo sheet sets.

Cozy Earth Coronado Lounge Chair

Cozy Earth Linen Bamboo Sheet Set

SSENSE

SSENSE doesn’t carry your average home essentials. The pieces from this retailer are far more high-end and unlike anything you’ll find anywhere else—like this mug that looks more like a modern art piece. Ahead of the holiday weekend, the site is offering up to 60% off sale items. This is a much-anticipated seasonal sale, so don’t sleep on it.

Maki Rugs Entirety Rug

Henry Holland Studio Check Loop Mug
